document.full_text: the longing to know someone and be known by them -- not just one person, but in all one's daily dealings. that is what feels missing in a veiled world, at least for someone who comes to it unveiled.
document.title: at war: my first afghan burqa
lines_and_colors: the longing to know someone and be known by them -- not just one person, but in all one's daily dealings. that is what feels missing in a veiled world, at least for someone who comes to it unveiled.
